page.title: 08The Longshaw Estate
page.content: There are refreshments, Red Cross and St. Johns Ambulance Brigade, a playground and various stalls to refresh ones concentration on the main event. On the Sunday before the trials, a special prayer is said in the hope that sunshine will prevail throughout the trials. The Longshaw Sheepdog Trials Association also serves to support local charities, and Trials nationally are increasing in popularity due to recent television coverage. This summer's weather has been very poor, and although the sky remained fairly clear this year, many competitors were forced to retire due to persistent winds, which obliterated the commands of the shepherds, but could not deter that special atmosphere created by watching man and his dog at work.
